Because jayce has been reduced to clutch your mana and shoot a quarter of it out for on big lethality slap, there were other styles before which included more spell spam sheen builds that utilized crit and ER or Tear, but with games being so much shorter and so much more snowbally, tear is a bad item to build on someone like jayce these days. Essence reaver before offered first lifesteal and mana sustain, then it offered the crit synergy allowing PD, IE, and Tri to work well with it (Before tri was swapped to a stinger from a zeal)

Now jayce is forced into a very unhealthy build which more or less functions as Lethality varus

Old ER was significantly more effective on jayce than it is now, it only serves as a crutch now for people who are learning the champ.

jayce by the way is likely the most manastarved AD champion in the game, and his itemization is so poor for mana that it in conjunction with the frankly poorly implemented lethality items forces him to go 1-2 lethality items, cleaver, Lord doms or Mortal reminder, and usually a GA. Sometimes he'll skip duskblade in favor of death's dance or maw
